: ''Not to be confused with [[Rick (Aroura's husband)]].''

'''Rick''' is the hitchhiker [[Phoebe Buffay|Phoebe]] and [[Joey Tribbiani|Joey]] picked up while driving back from Vegas. Phoebe at first hates Joey for letting an unknown guy drive the car, but she starts to really like him and even gives him her address and phone number. He is never seen again.
